name: O Xauara
description:
Made for "UNIDOS game jam"

As the South American Yanomami tribe describes, "Xauara" is a word for an ill tempered manner or thought, depicting wicked people and their evil ways. You have to lead the character “Okakëbë”, the spirit of the forest, out of the burning forest, or he will perish alongside the jungle. The indigenous native tribes, who are losing their homes and lands to the inferno caused by the greed of Xauaras in Brazil, need your help, they are the last line of defense to our natural resources, consider donating to this cause!
To know more about APIB (Articulation of Indigenous Peoples of Brazil) and donate visit: http://apiboficial.org/apoie/?lang=en

—Controllers—

Find your way out of the hellish jungle.

WASD - Move
Space bar - Jump
Mouse - Look Around

———

To play, download from the google drive link, and extract from the ZIP file.
